references: Amends: [Ordinance 106089](http://clerk.seattle.gov/~scripts/nph-brs.exe?s1=&s3=&s4=106089&s2=&s5=&Sect4=AND&l=20&Sect2=THESON&Sect3=PLURON&Sect5=CBORY&Sect6=HITOFF&d=ORDF&p=1&u=/~public/cbory.htm&r=0&f=S); Unsuccessful attempt at repeal: [Council Bill 98602](http://clerk.seattle.gov/~scripts/nph-brs.exe?s1=&s3=98602&s4=&s2=&s5=&Sect4=AND&l=20&Sect2=THESON&Sect3=PLURON&Sect5=CBORY&Sect6=HITOFF&d=ORDF&p=1&u=/~public/cbory.htm&r=0&f=S); Repealed by: [Ordinance 107224](http://clerk.seattle.gov/~scripts/nph-brs.exe?s1=&s3=&s4=107224&s2=&s5=&Sect4=AND&l=20&Sect2=THESON&Sect3=PLURON&Sect5=CBORY&Sect6=HITOFF&d=ORDF&p=1&u=/~public/cbory.htm&r=0&f=S)
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the registration of bicycles; amending Sections 3, 5, 12 or Ordinance 106089; extending the period for bicycle registration; authorizing bicycle dealers to sell registration certificates and reducing the fine for violation of the ordinance.
